author: Rachel Kaser
title: Nintendo tries to outsmart the bell barons of Animal Crossing
description: Nintendo introduced its April update to Animal Crossing: New Horizons, which has introduced such lovely things as an art gallery, Nature Day, and… a rejiggering of the in-game economy? One which might have come about because players are exploiting in-game res…
